name: svg-path-properties
description: Calculate the length for an SVG path, to use it with node or a Canvas element

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n spp -o build/path-properties.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/path-properties.js -c -m -o build/path-properties.min.js
